name: Lips high shimmer
details: Warning: Intense Hydration Ahead. Lasting Glow. GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid and Antioxidants delivers a powerful burst of hydration and radiance instantly and over time. This glow-enhancing serum is available in 5 radiant variants, like Sunlit Glow, Brightening Boost, Dewy Dream, Golden Radiance, and Fresh Awakening. Prepare for visibly brighter, smoother, and more luminous skin every day.

reviews.comment: Absolutely love the shimmer and hydration!
Beautiful gloss but slightly sticky.
My lips feel so soft, and the shine is amazing!

name: Ori clay body shimmer
details: Enhances skin glow with a subtle shimmer.Deeply moisturizes and nourishes the skin,Suitable for all skin types,Long-lasting and non-greasy
how_to_use: Apply a small amount onto clean, dry skin and gently massage in circular motions for an even shimmer.
Squeeze a generous amount onto your palm and apply directly to areas you want to highlight, such as your shoulders, collarbones, or legs. Blend in for a soft, glowing finish.
For a dewy effect, apply a thin layer over your body after showering to lock in moisture and create a radiant glow.
Massage a small amount into your arms, legs, or face for a natural, sun-kissed shimmer. Reapply as desired for more intensity.
Use as a finishing touch after applying makeup. Gently tap onto your cheekbones or dÃ©colletage for a luminous, glowing look.
For a long-lasting glow, apply in layers, starting with a light coat and building up to your desired level of shimmer.
For a subtle, all-over glow, mix a few drops into your regular body lotion or moisturizer and apply to your entire body.

reviews.comment: Absolutely love this shimmer! My skin feels soft and looks radiant.
The scent is amazing, and the shimmer is subtle yet beautiful.

name: Multi combo Lips pallete
how_to_use: Prep Your Lips â€“ Start with clean, moisturized lips for a smooth application. Exfoliate if needed to remove dry skin.
Choose Your Shade â€“ Use the included brush or your fingertip to pick a shade from the palette. Mix and match colors to create custom shades.
Apply the Color â€“ Dab the color onto your lips starting from the center and blending outward for an even finish. Layer for more intensity.
Create an Ombre Look â€“ Apply a darker shade to the outer corners of your lips and a lighter shade in the center. Blend gently for a gradient effect.
Set for Long-Lasting Wear â€“ For extended wear, blot your lips with a tissue and reapply a second layer. Optionally, set with a light dusting of translucent powder.
For a long-lasting glow, apply in layers, starting with a light coat and building up to your desired level of shimmer.
For a subtle, all-over glow, mix a few drops into your regular body lotion or moisturizer and apply to your entire body.

reviews.comment: This is my new favorite gloss!
Very shiny but a bit pricey.
The crushed diamonds make my lips sparkle beautifully!

name: PoutPerfection Lipstick
how_to_use: Prep Your Lips â€“ Start with clean, exfoliated, and moisturized lips for a smooth application. Use a lip balm if needed.
Define with Lip Liner â€“ For a precise look, outline your lips with a matching or slightly darker lip liner to enhance the shape and prevent feathering.
Apply Directly or with a Brush â€“ Glide the lipstick directly onto your lips or use a lip brush for more precision.
Build for Intensity â€“ Apply one layer for a natural tint or layer it for a bold, more pigmented finish.
Blot for a Matte Effect â€“ For a long-lasting matte look, gently blot your lips with a tissue and reapply another thin layer.
Create a Plump Look â€“ Add a touch of highlighter or gloss to the center of your lips for a fuller, plumper appearance.
Lock It in Place â€“ For extended wear, lightly dust translucent powder over a tissue placed on your lips to set the color.

reviews.comment: I absolutely love the PoutPerfection Lipstick! The formula is so creamy and hydrating, and it glides on effortlessly. The color payoff is amazing, and it lasts for hours without drying out my lips. Plus, the packaging is so sleek and elegant. Definitely a must-have in my makeup bag! ðŸ’„âœ¨

This lipstick stays put all day without feeling heavy or sticky. I applied it in the morning, and even after lunch, the color was still vibrant! It doesnâ€™t crack or settle into lines, which is a huge plus. The shade range is also stunningâ€”I already bought two more!
The crushed diamonds make my lips sparkle beautifully!

name: Radiance Dew Highlighter
ingredients: Glycerin â€“ Provides hydration and a smooth application.
Mica (CI 77019) â€“ Adds a luminous shimmer for a glowing finish.
Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891) â€“ Helps reflect light and enhances radiance.
Hyaluronic Acid â€“ Keeps skin hydrated and plump.
Jojoba Oil (Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil) â€“ Nourishes and softens the skin.
Shea Butter (Butyrospermum Parkii Butter) â€“ Adds moisture and smooth texture.
Dimethicone â€“ Creates a silky, blendable texture for easy application.
Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499) â€“ Provides pigment for a natural highlight.
Fragrance (Parfum) â€“ Adds a subtle, pleasant scent.
how_to_use: Apply to high points of the face, such as cheekbones, brow bones, and the bridge of the nose, for a radiant glow.
Use fingertips, a makeup sponge, or a brush to blend the product into the skin for a seamless finish.
For a natural look, apply a small amount and blend well; for an intense highlight, layer the product as desired.
Mix with foundation or moisturizer for an all-over luminous effect.
Dab a little on the cupidâ€™s bow and collarbones for an extra touch of radiance.

reviews.comment: I love the texture and pigmentation of this lipstick! It feels lightweight yet super nourishing, and my lips stay soft all day. The only reason Iâ€™m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the scent is a bit strong for my liking. But overall, itâ€™s a fantastic lipstick that Iâ€™ll keep using!

This lipstick stays put all day without feeling heavy or sticky. I applied it in the morning, and even after lunch, the color was still vibrant! It doesnâ€™t crack or settle into lines, which is a huge plus. The shade range is also stunningâ€”I already bought two more!
The crushed diamonds make my lips sparkle beautifully!
